      • createActions

        public void createActions​(Board board,
                          int option,
                          java.util.List<PlayerDemeter> players)
        fills the actionsDemeter attributes with all the actions for this game if option is 0 the actions will be in interactive mode, random otherwise
        Parameters:
        board - the board
        option - 0 for interactive, whatever bit zero for random
        players - the players

      • act

        public void act​(Board board,
                int option)
         throws java.io.IOException,
                game.util.InvalidChoiceException
        excute the action of the demeter player
        Parameters:
        board - the board
        option - if option is 0 then we create a interactive actions List, otherwise the actions will be automatic
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception
        game.util.InvalidChoiceException - if the choice is not valid

        Throws:
        game.util.CantBuildException - if you can't build
